item.title: ‘I’m confused!’ Why does President Trump want a rate cut so badly?
item.description: A letter from a worried, wary Moneyist reader raises questions in the aftermath of the latest inflation data.

item.title: As Dalio gets out of Bridgewater, Bridgewater gets out of China
item.description: Ray Dalio’s departure coincides with the liquidation of Bridgewater’s Chinese exposure – just as the market is rebounding.

item.title: My wife and I are in our 50s and have $11 million. We’re not leaving it to our kids. Is that wrong?
Should I apply for a $70K-a-year job at 74 and risk losing my Section 8 housing allowance?
item.description: “I’ve been kept in poverty by social-services benefit cliffs.”

item.title: Emma Stone finds a buyer for $23.5 million Austin, Texas, estate that she just renovated
item.description: Actress Emma Stone has managed to find a buyer for her newly renovated Austin mansion, just three months after she listed it for $23.5 million.
